meanings.definition: People who go to the cinema.
meanings.sent1: Cinemagoers enjoy watching movies on the big screen.
meanings.sent2: The cinemagoers lined up eagerly to buy tickets for the latest blockbuster.
meanings.sent3: The group of cinemagoers laughed together at the funny scenes in the movie.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of cinemagoers, she felt like a solitary movie enthusiast.
meanings.sent5: The cinemagoers' excitement was palpable as they entered the theater.

meanings.sent1: The cinemagoers settled into their seats, ready for the film to start.
meanings.sent2: After work, the cinemagoers decided to catch a movie for relaxation.
meanings.sent3: One of the cinemagoers accidentally dropped their popcorn, causing a small commotion.
meanings.sent4: The group of cinemagoers moved in unison to find the perfect seats in the theater.
meanings.sent5: The cinemagoers' chatter filled the lobby as they discussed their favorite movies.
